display_long_description:
# Space Chefs Needed! 🧑‍🚀​
**Mars Kitchen** is an immersive simulation sandbox game on Mars. Meet strange **aliens**, explore different kitchen styles and embark on an **amazing space food journey!**
[media]
You are the new chef in charge of all the kitchens: put on your apron and get to work!
# 🍔 Multiple environments
**Sushi, Pizzeria, Food Truck and Earthbucks**: the top Mars Kitchen restaurants are waiting for you, chef! 
[media]
Start from the Control Room and take a break at the Stadium: **6 different environments** ready to play!

# 🍟 Unleash your Creativity 
Tidy or messy? Clean or chaotic? Break everything or put it all back in place? You decide what kind of **space chef** you are!
[media]
# 🎮 Unexpected Minigames
Slice flying fruit, launch pizzas at targets, score shots in giant cups, and more!
# 🍣 Quests, Recipes, a lot of work!
*100+ unique quests* to complete with dozens of recipes and items to use: are you able to satisfy all your customers?
[media]
# 🚨 Surprises Around Every Corner
Zero gravity, fly invasions, and a mysterious villain with a hidden agenda. Stay sharp, Space Chef!
[media]
# 🏟️ Don’t mess with the aliens! 
They can react in…*very* unpredictable ways.
Bottle throwing, spitting… even rocket launchers. Seriously, Chef, it’s better not to test their temper🚀👽
[media]
